description: EDUCATION is the cornerstone of any nation’s development, and in Pakistan, it holds even greater significance. The country is home to a burgeoning youth population, with over 60% of its citizens below the age of 25. This demographic dividend presents both an opportunity and a challenge. To harness the potential of its young people, Pakistan […]
title: Transforming Pakistan’s future through ESD

description: THE China-Pakistan Economic Corridor (CPEC) is a framework of regional connectivity. It will not only benefit China and Pakistan but will have positive impact on Iran, Afghanistan, Central Asian Republics and the region. To improve the lives of people of Pakistan and China by building an economic corridor promoting bilateral connectivity, construction, explore potential bilateral […]
title: Chinese concerns

description: The Indonesian Consulate General in Karachi marked the 79th Anniversary of Indonesian Independence with a dignified flag-raising ceremony. Teguh Wiweko, Acting Consul General of the Republic of Indonesia in Karachi, led the event, which honored the nation’s journey under the theme of “Building a New Nusantara, Advanced Indonesia.” Indonesian citizens, students, and the local […]
title: Indonesian consulate marks 79th Independence Day

description: Commissioner Karachi Syed Hassan Naqvi visited the districts of Malir, West, and Keamari to assess the progress of the ongoing anti-polio campaign. Accompanied by the Coordinator of the Commissioner Karachi polio task force, Naqvi chaired a meeting at the DC Malir office on Friday evening. During the briefing, Deputy Commissioner Malir Irfan Salam updated […]
title: Commissioner reviews anti-polio efforts

description: Syed Raza Hussain, President of the Federal B Area Association of Industries (FBATI), has called on the government and relevant authorities to expedite the release of allocated funds for the incremental benefit subsidy on electricity for Karachi’s industrial units, particularly Small and Medium Enterprises (SMEs). This action is crucial to prevent the closure of […]
title: FBATI urges release of incremental benefit subsidy to industrial units

description: The Clifton Defence Community (CDC) and DHA City Karachi (DCK) have officially joined forces to promote a greener future, signing a Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) for the 2024 mega Plantation activity. Sponsored by Property Trade, the agreement was signed by Fahad Ilyas Nainitalwala representing CDC and Col. Kashif Fazal (Retd) from DHA City Karachi, […]
title: CDC, DHA city unites for plantation drive

description: The Arts Council of Pakistan is set to host the “World Culture Festival Karachi,” an extraordinary event that will bring together participants from over 40 countries. Kicking off on September 26 and running until October 30, 2024, this festival will be the largest of its kind in Pakistan’s history. The announcement was made during […]
title: ACP to host world culture festival featuring 40 nations

description: KE has lauded the exceptional contributions of women within its ranks, recognizing their pivotal role in advancing the company in a predominantly male-dominated energy sector. In response to recent disparaging remarks made by Pakistan Tehrek-e-Insaf (PTI) MNA Muhammad Iqbal Khan Afridi about a female KE official during a Standing Committee on Power meeting, Syed […]
title: KE reaffirms commitment to gender equality after disparaging remarks by PTI MNA

description: The Sindh Human Rights Defenders Network (SHRDN) organized a fact-finding delegation to Keenjhar Lake, following concerns raised by the local community regarding the recently approved Floating Solar Project. The project, backed by the Sindh Government, has sparked fears about its potential adverse effects on the lake’s environment, biodiversity, and the livelihood of the fisherfolk […]
title: Concern over floating solar project’s impact on Keenjhar lake ecosystem

description: On the directive of Governor Sindh Kamran Khan Tessori, thousands of ration bags have arrived at Governor House.These ration bags contain hygienically packed essential items, including flour, sugar, lentils, ghee, and oil, among others. Each bag is designed to meet the needs of a small family for a month. The distribution of these ration […]
title: Thousands of ration bags arrived at Governor House

description: KARACHI — A shocking incident has been reported in the country’s financial hub Karachi where a young man is in critical condition after eating a sandwich containing a metal earring. The victim identified as Samuel said he got a sandwich from Imtiaz Super Store and he later suffered oral bleeding while eating the snack. The […]
title: Karachi man lands in hospital after eating ‘Imtiaz Store sandwich containing metal earring’

description: Pakistani auto market remained in dire straits for two years in a row amid massive increases in car prices and aggressive taxation which led to a drop in sales of all cars including the Toyota Yaris 1.3HCVT which is now available on special rate installment plans. Toyota Yaris is now available with UBL’s exclusive financing […]
title: Toyota Yaris Discounted Installment Plan in Pakistan; Details inside

description: KARACHI – A tragic incident occured at Jinnah International Airport in Karachi KARACHI as a sniffer dog of the Anti-Narcotics Force (ANF) was shot dead. The poor animal was accidentally killed at Jinnah International Airport in Karachi after wandering into a restricted bay area. A statement issued by Pakistan Civil Aviation Authority said the airside […]
title: ANF sniffer dog shot dead in Karachi airport tragic incident

description: LAHORE – Punjab Chief Minister Maryam Nawaz approved distributing laptops among college and university students, enhancing their education by providing access to digital resources. Maryam Nawaz led government vowed to improve digital literacy, by enabling interactive and flexible learning for the students. CM approved two new initiatives, PML-N’s favorite Laptop Scheme, and students Scholarship Programme., […]
title: Punjab CM Maryam Nawaz Laptop Scheme Latest Update August 2024

description: A month before release of Apple iPhone 16, new pictures of official upcoming flagship devices were leaked online, creating frenzy among fans as the snaps showed phone in new color options with slight change in the back of the device. The leaked pictures shared on social site Reddit feature 3 dummy units of iPhone 16 […]
title: iPhone 16 Leaked pictures show New Color Options, innovative Features

description: KARACHI – A patient diagnosed with Monkeypox (mpox virus) in Mardan, Khyber Pakhtunkhwa has escaped while health officials started looking for him to curb the spread of infectious disease. It has been learnt that the patient was tested positive for virus in Peshawar when he returned from Saudi Arabia. When health officials visited his home […]
title: First Monkeypox patient of KP escapes as health officials race to track him down

description: BANGKOK –  Paetongtarn Shinawatra has made history by becoming Thailand’s second female and youngest-ever prime minister. The 37-year-old political leader secured a decisive victory in parliament, winning 247 out of 493 votes, comfortably surpassing the required majority. Paetongtarn is the third member of the influential Shinawatra family to rise to the office of prime minister, […]
title: Paetongtarn Shinawatra becomes Thailand’s youngest PM

description: ISLAMABAD – Minister for Information and Broadcasting Attaullah Tarar on Saturday said federal and Punjab governments are committed to public relief agenda. Addressing a news conference in Islamabad , he said the Punjab government’s decision to reduce electricity prices by fourteen rupees per unit for consumers using up to five hundred units is an unprecedented […]
title: Efforts underway to reduce electricity prices: Atta Tarar

description: LKARACHI –  The special polio vaccination campaign on Saturday faced a major  challenges since its launch. On the first day of the initiative, 27% of parents refused to have their children vaccinated against polio, a.local TV reported. The campaign, which incorporates modern technology, is set to continue until August 25. It includes both oral vaccinations […]
title: Polio campaign: 27 % of parents refuse vaccination of their children in Karachi
